rule: The output must describe the background of the photo.
input: A field of lavender in full bloom with a distant farmhouse under a clear blue sky. The image should feel serene and pastoral.
output: Depict a sun-kissed field of vibrant purple lavender in full bloom, stretching endlessly towards the horizon, interspersed with wisps of golden blooms dancing gently in the mild breeze. A quaint white-washed farmhouse rests at a distance, nestled under an expansive clear blue sky with fluffy clouds floating idly above. The scene captures late afternoon sunlight casting gentle shadows and a warm glow across the flowers, illuminating their velvety texture and rich hues. In the background, rolling emerald hills merge into the horizon, contributing to the sense of openness. The composition invites calmness and nostalgia, evoking feelings of tranquility and inviting contemplation, characteristic of a serene, pastoral landscape.
complianceText:
The output does comply with the chatbot description, as it transforms the description into a detailed prompt for generating an AI photo. It first focuses on the subjects (lavender field, farmhouse), their characteristics (vibrant purple, white-washed), timing and lighting (late afternoon sunlight casting gentle shadows), and the background (rolling emerald hills, clear blue sky with fluffy clouds). It concludes with the feeling the image should evoke (calmness, nostalgia, tranquility). The entire description is crafted in a single paragraph and does not exceed 80 words.

OK
